Quetzal Overview
================
quetzal is a Python package providing flexible models for transport planning and traffic forecasting.


Packages
========

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   quetzal.engine
   quetzal.model
   quetzal.io
   quetzal.analysis

Free software
=============
Join us on GitHub https://github.com/systragroup/quetzal
